body_html:
Thanks for posting this, @kingtaurus! This is quite useful for me.
If I'm not mistaken, your code constructs a tensorflow expression on a per-tree basis.
I think it would be more efficient to use control flow mechanisms to collect the tensors at each node and send them through a single previously defined network in batches.
But it seems that implementing it this way is quite tricky.

body:
Thanks for posting this, @kingtaurus! This is quite useful for me.
If I'm not mistaken, your code constructs a tensorflow expression on a per-tree basis.
I think it would be more efficient to use control flow mechanisms to collect the tensors at each node and send them through a single previously defined network in batches.
But it seems that implementing it this way is quite tricky.
